definition: to shout/to call/to order/to ask/to be called/by (indicates agent in the passive mood)
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt

definition: to shout/to bawl/to yell (to urge on an animal)/to hawk (one's wares)/to denounce loudly/to shout slogans
to set up a vendor's stall in the street
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
to set up a stall/to maintain a large staff and organization
